name: My House
detailed_description:
Build your house according to your desires in My House! Let your creativity express itself in a chill atmosphere!

Choose the layout of the room, the size, the color, the shape ... A lot of furniture will allow you to put style in your house!



Features:

■ Chill and relaxing game!
■ Easy to handle!
■ Several choices of paintings!
■ A lot of furniture!
■ Nice background music!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphique
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All

Recommended:
